attributes.action: STOP ANY INCREASE IN THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE LIVING IN THE UNITED KINGDOM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS WOULD REDUCE, A DEMAND FOR MORE VEHICLES ON THE ROAD, MORE BEDS IN HOSPITALS, MORE PLACES IN SCHOOLS, MORE DEMANDS ON SOCIAL SERVICES, LESS NEED TO BUILD MORE HOUSES AND CONCRETE OVER THE GREEN BELT, LESS CONFLICT OVER MULTICULTURALISM, BUT WILL PROVIDE MORE VOTES FOR THE POLITICAL PARTY IN POWER.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/over-population/

If you decide to re-submit please do not use BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
